articles.title: North Carolina town founded by freed slaves gets levee help
articles.description: PRINCEVILLE, N.C. (AP) — The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers has agreed to spend $39.6 million to help preserve an eastern North Carolina town founded by freed slaves that's been damaged repeatedly by floodwaters from hurricanes.

articles.title: Kenyan marathon star Kiprotich suspended for doping offenses
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — Wilson Kipsang Kiprotich, the former world record holder for the men's marathon, has been provisionally suspended for doping violations.
articles.content:
LONDON (AP) Wilson Kipsang Kiprotich, the former world record holder for the men's marathon, has been provisionally suspended for doping violations.
